target_name: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys have access to quality early childhood development, care and pre-primary education so that they are ready for primary education
computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
indicator_name: Proportion of children aged 24-59 months of age who are developmentally on track in health, learning and psychosocial well-being, by sex

computation_calculations: Interviews with households with children aged under 18
